entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers this morning. Snow level rising to 2100 metres this afternoon. High 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Snow level 2200 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then 30 percent chance of rain showers late in the morning and early afternoon. Snow level rising to 1800 metres in the morning. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 24 April 2023
